comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x1: Number of hours factory 1 operates
- x2: Number of hours factory 2 operates

Extracted Constraints:
- 5x1 + 10x2 \geq 20 (black bears production constraint)
- 6x1 + 10x2 \geq 5 (white bears production constraint)
- 3x1 \geq 15 (brown bears production constraint)
- x1, x2 \geq 0 (non-negativity constraints)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize the total cost: $300x1 + $600x2
